title: Fort Davis National Historic Site: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids              For Kids          Children age 8 through 14 can earn a badge or patch by doing the Junior Ranger Program under adult supervision, children follow a map and gather clues; they then have to DECODE a secret message. Allow 1 1/2 to 2 hours to complete. We also have a Junior Ranger Program for children under 8.   2015 Schedule to be announced. View last year's flier below. Summer Junior Ranger Days 2014 Flier (DOC/PDF). Parents bring your kids out so they can become Juior Rangers having fun, learninig and earning a Junior Ranger Patch! FREE!!! This is the National Park Service's site for kids of all ages. If you love our National Parks, Monuments and Historic Sites, this site is for you. If you are new to our National Parks, we hope this site helps you experience how wonderful they can be.     Slave - Soldier - Citizen: The Journey of the Buffalo Soldiers Online Field Trip!!
